entries.morag_q2_needed: A crystal used in the crafting of lightsabers.
entries.charal_q4_needed: A commlink used by a group of survivalists. A hairline fracture runs across the base of the device, which may get worse if not repaired in time.
entries.charal_q1_needed: A spleen taken from the chest of a healthy Ewok. A precious item, considering how bad the Ewok refused to hand it over. What Charal plans to do with it is better left unknown.
